meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Evan Voorn Kellie Herson Rani Peffer Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6703.

td.p: Evan Voorn, a student teacher from Fort Worth, Texas
Kellie Herson, a Ph.D. student and teaching assistant originally from Green Bay, Wisconsin
Rani Peffer, a corporate finance manager from Crittenden, Kentucky (whose 1-day cash winnings total $14,311)

tr.td: IT'S A FEDERAL HOLIDAY
GET YOUR FACTS STRAIGHT
(Alex: And all of the clues will be presented by the paper's food writer, Mark Bittman.)
IN THE WORLD CAPITAL
MYSTERY FOLKS
BEASTLY WORDS & PHRASES

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'The idea for this holiday is credited to Peter J. McGuire, a carpenter & union leader')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: The idea for this holiday is credited to Peter J. McGuire, a carpenter & union leader

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', 'Van Heflin was in "Shane" & "3:10 to Yuma"; this group gave us songs like "Hot For Teacher"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Van Heflin was in "Shane" & "3:10 to Yuma"; this group gave us songs like "Hot For Teacher"

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_3_1', 'clue_J_3_1_stuck', '(Mark Bittman delivers the clue.) In one of my Opinionator pieces, I talked about the dangers of pesticide exposure & a move toward this type of food grown without the use of chemicals')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Mark Bittman delivers the clue.) In one of my Opinionator pieces, I talked about the dangers of pesticide exposure & a move toward this type of food grown without the use of chemicals

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_3_2', 'clue_J_3_2_stuck', '(Mark Bittman delivers the clue.) At nytimes.com you\'ll find videos on how to cook a variety of dishes, American & international, like dal tarka, a lentil dish from this country')

Kellie
Evan

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Rani
Kellie
Evan
PLYMOUTH COLONY
LIT-TREE-TURE
MEDICAL TALK
COLLEGES & UNIVERSITIES
READJUSTED
(Alex: Each correct response will be a short word that is composed of the letters in "readjusted".)
BEATLE-Y WORDS & PHRASES

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
